meta.title: Home :: Capital City Public Charter School

noscript.div: JavaScript Disabled! For a better experience on this website please enable JavaScript in your browser.

div.p: Capital City is closed until April 27. Please visit our family resource page for school and distance learning updates and resources related to the Coronavirus. Capital City will provide free meals on Mondays from 10am-2pm. Children under 18 can pick up seven meals & seven snacks.

Capital City cerrará hasta el 27 de abril. Por favor, visite nuestra página de recursos para familias para las novedades de la escuela y aprendizaje a distancia y recursos sobre el Coronavirus. Capital City proveerá comidas gratis los lunes de 10am al 2pm. Los niños de 18 y menor pueden recoger siete comidas y siete botanas.

div.div: Family & Friends Giving Fund helps cover additional distance learning costs for all our students. Consider making a donation today!

div.strong: A Tier 1 School Beating the Odds

div.div: Our students are completing high school, matriculating, and graduating college at higher rates than the rest of the nation. Learn more.
7th Grade Science Teacher, Justin Lopez-Cardoze, named DC's 2020 Teacher of the Year! Watch the surprise announcement on local news.
Join our outstanding team of teachers and staff at Capital City! Learn more.
We serve nearly 1,000 students in grades PreK-12 in Ward 4 of Washington, DC. Learn more.
Designated an EL Education Mentor School, Capital City is a top-performing school in EL's national network. Learn more.

div.p:
Capital City Public Charter School serves students of all ages, all backgrounds, and from every Ward in the District. Through a focus on the whole child, we engage students in their own learning, community and world, using a project-based approach. Learn more.
Watch this EL Education video that was filmed at Capital City to see a snapshot of the amazing learning experiences that happen here every day.

div.div: The Family & Friends Giving Fund helps cover our distance learning costs to support students.
